body: This made me nostalgic, especially considering that it is the same party that I always use throughout the game (Arngrim OP).

The scanlator apologizes profusely for being new at it, and not actually knowing Japanese and thus depending upon MTL and personal judgement...

Welp, until I read that, I hadn't a clue that was so. 
It flowed, it hung together in regard to plot, dialogue, etc falling in line with the artwork, so my guess is that they did a pretty durn good job of piecing it together that way.

I've read far worse translations...far far worse.
Why do decent ones end so quickly, but dogshit manga continue indefinitely?
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me
Bruh it's a ps2 game so of course it's underrated. lol
Such an underrated gem of a game
